description:
This is how France's iconic Notre Dame Cathedral was rebuilt.
Head to https://brilliant.org/TheB1M/ for a 30-day free trial + the first 200 people will receive 20% off their annual subscription.

Full story here - https://www.theb1m.com/video/the-1bn-race-to-save-notre-dame-from-collapse

This video contains paid promotion for Brilliant. 

Additional footage and images courtesy of FUKAS, BBC, the Dronalist, France24, Disney, ﻿Vincent Callebaut, ﻿Ulf Mejergren Architects and CBC News.

For more by The B1M subscribe now - https://bit.ly/the-b1m

We're raising awareness of construction's mental health crisis through our Get Construction Talking initiative. There’s a video series on our channel and you can find support or donate at - https://www.getconstructiontalking.org/

title: The $1BN Race to Save Notre Dame From Collapse
